title: Summary - Hurricane Otis (EP3/EP182023)
author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary:
...EYE OF CATEGORY 5 HURRICANE OTIS ABOUT TO MAKE LANDFALL NEAR  ACAPULCO MEXICO... ...CATASTROPHIC DAMAGE LIKELY WHERE THE CORE MOVES ONSHORE...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Wed Oct 25
 the center of Otis was located near 16.7, -99.8
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 923 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 165 mph.
